languages.text: "Уйдешь. Но без сапог. Без оружия. И, может, без куска-другого плоти". {n}Мужчина глумливо улыбается.{/n} "Тебе разве не говорили, что в моровую яму соваться опасно?"

"Oh, you'll leave. But without your boots. And your weapons. And maybe a piece or two of your flesh." {n}He leers mockingly.{/n} "Didn't anyone ever tell you it's dangerous to poke your nose into the pestilence pit?"
languages.original_text: "Уйдешь. Но без сапог. Без оружия. И, может, без куска-другого плоти". {n}Мужчина глумливо улыбается.{/n} "Тебе разве не говорили, что в моровую яму соваться опасно?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, you'll leave. But without your boots. And your weapons. And maybe a piece or two of your flesh." {n}He leers mockingly.{/n} "Didn't anyone ever tell you it's dangerous to poke your nose into the pestilence pit?"

"Oh, you'll leave. But without your boots. And your weapons. And maybe a piece or two of your flesh." {n}He leers mockingly.{/n} "Didn't anyone ever tell you it's dangerous to poke your nose into the pestilence pit?"

"Oh, you'll leave. But without your boots. And your weapons. And maybe a piece or two of your flesh." {n}He leers mockingly.{/n} "Didn't anyone ever tell you it's dangerous to poke your nose into the pestilence pit?"

"Oh, you'll leave. But without your boots. And your weapons. And maybe a piece or two of your flesh." {n}He leers mockingly.{/n} "Didn't anyone ever tell you it's dangerous to poke your nose into the pestilence pit?"

"Oh, you'll leave. But without your boots. And your weapons. And maybe a piece or two of your flesh." {n}He leers mockingly.{/n} "Didn't anyone ever tell you it's dangerous to poke your nose into the pestilence pit?"

languages.text: «Oh, ya lo creo que se irán. Pero sin las botas. Y las armas. Y algún que otro trozo de carne». {n}Esboza una sonrisa burlona.{/n} «¿No les ha advertido nadie que es muy peligroso asomar la nariz en el pozo de pestilencia?».
languages.original_text: "Oh, you'll leave. But without your boots. And your weapons. And maybe a piece or two of your flesh." {n}He leers mockingly.{/n} "Didn't anyone ever tell you it's dangerous to poke your nose into the pestilence pit?"

traits.locale_text: «Oh, ya lo creo que se irán. Pero sin las botas. Y las armas. Y algún que otro trozo de carne». {n}Esboza una sonrisa burlona.{/n} «¿No les ha advertido nadie que es muy peligroso asomar la nariz en el pozo de pestilencia?».

languages.text: 「ああ、君は帰るんだ。でも、ブーツなしで。武器もなしで。さらに肉片のひとつやふたつも欠けているかもな」{n}彼は、あざ笑うように笑った。{/n}「疫病の穴に鼻を突っ込むのは危険だと言われなかったのか？」
languages.original_text: "Oh, you'll leave. But without your boots. And your weapons. And maybe a piece or two of your flesh." {n}He leers mockingly.{/n} "Didn't anyone ever tell you it's dangerous to poke your nose into the pestilence pit?"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、君は帰るんだ。でも、ブーツなしで。武器もなしで。さらに肉片のひとつやふたつも欠けているかもな」{n}彼は、あざ笑うように笑った。{/n}「疫病の穴に鼻を突っ込むのは危険だと言われなかったのか？」

languages.text: “噢，你要走了。你人可以走，但你的靴子得留下来，还有你的武器。说不定，你还得分一两块肉给我们才行。”{n}他嘲弄地瞟了你一眼。{/n}“在疫病坑里到处乱晃很危险，没人告诉过你吗？”
languages.original_text: "Oh, you'll leave. But without your boots. And your weapons. And maybe a piece or two of your flesh." {n}He leers mockingly.{/n} "Didn't anyone ever tell you it's dangerous to poke your nose into the pestilence pit?"

traits.locale_text: “噢，你要走了。你人可以走，但你的靴子得留下来，还有你的武器。说不定，你还得分一两块肉给我们才行。”{n}他嘲弄地瞟了你一眼。{/n}“在疫病坑里到处乱晃很危险，没人告诉过你吗？”

languages.text: "Oh, das werdet Ihr. Allerdings ohne Eure Stiefel. Und Euren Waffen. Und vielleicht dem ein oder anderen Körperteil." {n}Er grinst dich anzüglich an.{/n} "Hat Euch niemand gesagt, dass es gefährlich ist, seine Nase in die Pestgrube zu stecken?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, you'll leave. But without your boots. And your weapons. And maybe a piece or two of your flesh." {n}He leers mockingly.{/n} "Didn't anyone ever tell you it's dangerous to poke your nose into the pestilence pit?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, das werdet Ihr. Allerdings ohne Eure Stiefel. Und Euren Waffen. Und vielleicht dem ein oder anderen Körperteil." {n}Er grinst dich anzüglich an.{/n} "Hat Euch niemand gesagt, dass es gefährlich ist, seine Nase in die Pestgrube zu stecken?"

languages.text: « Oh que oui, vous allez nous débarrasser le plancher. Mais pas avant de nous avoir filé vos bottes, vos armes et peut-être même une ou deux bonnes livres de chair sanguinolente. » {n}Il s'esclaffe d'un air narquois.{/n} « On vous a jamais dit que c'était dangereux de fourrer son nez dans la fosse aux pestilences ? »
languages.original_text: "Oh, you'll leave. But without your boots. And your weapons. And maybe a piece or two of your flesh." {n}He leers mockingly.{/n} "Didn't anyone ever tell you it's dangerous to poke your nose into the pestilence pit?"

traits.locale_text: « Oh que oui, vous allez nous débarrasser le plancher. Mais pas avant de nous avoir filé vos bottes, vos armes et peut-être même une ou deux bonnes livres de chair sanguinolente. » {n}Il s'esclaffe d'un air narquois.{/n} « On vous a jamais dit que c'était dangereux de fourrer son nez dans la fosse aux pestilences ? »

languages.text: "Gideceksin ama botların olmadan. Silahlarını da bırak. Belki etinden birkaç parça da bırakabilirsin." {n}Adam, dalga geçerek bakıyor.{/n} "Veba çukuruna burnunu sokmanın tehlikeli olduğunu sana kimse söylemedi mi?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, you'll leave. But without your boots. And your weapons. And maybe a piece or two of your flesh." {n}He leers mockingly.{/n} "Didn't anyone ever tell you it's dangerous to poke your nose into the pestilence pit?"
